text: Don Bluth Entertainment (formerly Sullivan Bluth Studios) was an Irish- American animation studio. Don Bluth made it in 1979. Bluth and several colleagues, all of whom were former Disney animators, left Disney on September 13, 1979 to form Don Bluth Productions, later known as the Bluth Group. ==References== Category:1979 establishments Category:American animation studios Category:Companies based in California Category:Companies based in Ireland Category:1995 disestablishments in the United States Category:Defunct companies of the United States
title: Sullivan Bluth Studios
